#summary Documentation of the factory action helpers.

= Factory Action Helpers =
Rend includes a number of action helpers that work as factories for easily creating common objects based on values in the config file.

 * Zend_Acl
 * Zend_Auth
 * Zend_Auth_Adapter
 * Zend_Config
 * Zend_Db_Adapter
 * Zend_Db_Table
 * Zend_Locale
 * Zend_Log
 * Zend_Search_Lucene
 * Zend_Mail
 * Zend_Mail_Transport
 * Zend_Translate
 * Zend_View
